name: Dragon vs Archers
description:
Created in 2 hours.

Arrow keys to move

Space to shoot

ALT creates more archers. Creating archers costs points, the more you have the more it costs. If you run out of points, you lose.

Archers can be sacrificed to block fireballs. If a fireball reaches the edge of screen, you lose! Note that some fireballs are still spawning in way to high to block. These will not cause you to lose.

Credits:

Dragon from http://opengameart.org/content/rpg-enemies-11-drag... by Stephen "Redshrike" Challener, MrBeast, Surt, Blarumyrran, Sharm, Zabin

Fireball from http://opengameart.org/content/simple-fireball by Sogomn

Archer from http://opengameart.org/content/archer-static-64x64 by LordNeo

Background, arrows and wall by Languard Gemstrike (that's me)

All logic/code by Languard Gemstrike
